fi.tamk.mindpuzzle

Class MainMenuScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • fi.tamk.mindpuzzle.MainMenuScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class MainMenuScreen
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
    MainMenuScreen is the main menu of the game including buttons for play, how to play, settings, credits and exit.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainMenuScreen

        public MainMenuScreen(MindPuzzle app)
        Class constructor. Uses the MindPuzzle reference to set the screen. Creates a stage using StretchViewPort with MindPuzzle class' viewport dimensions and camera.
        Parameters:
        app - MindPuzzle class's object

    • Method Detail

      • show

        public void show()
        Initializes the textures. Sets the previous screen. Gets the score and sound and music settings from the Preferences file.
        Specified by:
        show in interface com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
        Overrides:
        show in class com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter

      • receiveENQuestions

                               java.lang.String[][] sleep,
                               java.lang.String[][] sport,
                               java.lang.String[][] hobby,
                               java.lang.String[][] food)
        Receives English 2D arrays from the MindPuzzle and clones them into the MainMenuScreen's 2D arrays.
        Parameters:
        social - array containing questions about relationships
        sleep - array containing questions about sleep and rest
        sport - array containing questions about exercise
        hobby - array containing questions about hobbies
        food - array containing questions about food and eating habits

      • render

        public void render(float delta)
        Calls every actor's act()-method that has added to the stage. Draws the stage and game logo on the screen.
        Specified by:
        render in interface com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
        Overrides:
        render in class com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
        Parameters:
        delta - The time in seconds since the last render.

      • saveSettings

        public void saveSettings(java.lang.Boolean music,
                         java.lang.Boolean sound)
        Saves the music and sound settings to the Preferences file.
        Parameters:
        music - false when music is set off, true when music is set on
        sound - false when sound effects are set off, true when sound effects are set on

      • openSettings

        public void openSettings(java.lang.Boolean music,
                         java.lang.Boolean sound)
        Retrieves the settings for music and sounds from the Preferences file. Sets them to play if the return value is true. Sets them off if the return value is false.
        Parameters:
        music - keyword to music
        sound - keyword to sounds

      • resetSettings

        public void resetSettings()
        Resets the settings for music and sound effects.

        public void resize(int width,
                   int height)

        Overrides:
        resize in class com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
        Parameters:
        width - The viewport's width of the device
        height - The viewport's height of the device
